message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1500000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1200000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I value the product at much more, I'm willing to come down to $1350000 to facilitate this deal. This is a fair price considering its value and the potential it holds. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay up to $1300000. I believe this is a fair compromise given my budget constraints.
